1st_singular.english: I will stay / I will live

2nd_singular.english: you will stay / you will live

1st_plural.english: we will stay / we will live

1st_singular.english: I will start / I will begin

2nd_singular.english: you will start / you will begin

1st_plural.english: we will start / we will begin

1st_singular.english: I will hear / I will listen

2nd_singular.english: you will hear / you will listen

1st_plural.english: we will hear / we will listen

1st_singular.english: I will speak / I will talk

2nd_singular.english: you will speak / you will talk

1st_plural.english: we will speak / we will talk

english_translation: to pass / to cross / to spend (time)
to hurt / to be in pain
to comb oneself / to comb one's hair
to be located / to be found
to hurry / be in a hurry

1st_singular.english: I will be in a hurry

2nd_singular.english: you will be in a hurry

3rd_singular.english: he/she will be in a hurry

1st_plural.english: we will be in a hurry

2nd_plural.english: you (plural) will be in a hurry

3rd_plural.english: they will be in a hurry

english_translation: to be guilty / to be at fault
to treat / to offer (a drink, food)
to spoil / to ruin / to break
